verses.t: And{G2532} Jesus entered{G1525} and passed{G1330} through Jericho{G2410}.
And{G2532}, behold{G2400}, there was a man{G435} named{G2564} Zacchæus{G2195}, which{G846} was{G2258} the chief among the publicans{G754}, and{G2532} he{G3778} was{G2258} rich{G4145}.

And{G2532} he sought{G2212} to see{G1492} Jesus{G3588} who{G5101} he was{G2076}; and{G2532} could{G1410} not{G3756} for{G575} the press{G3588}, because{G3754} he was{G2258} little{G3398} of stature{G3588}.
And{G2532} he ran{G4390} before{G1715}, and climbed up{G305} into{G1909} a sycomore tree{G4809} to{G2443} see{G1492} him{G846}: for{G3754} he was{G3195} to pass{G1330} that{G1565} way.

And{G2532} when{G5613} Jesus{G3588} came{G2064} to{G1909} the place{G3588}, he looked up{G308}, and saw{G1492} him{G846}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Zacchæus{G2195}, make haste{G4692}, and come down{G2597}; for{G1063} to day{G4594} I{G3165} must{G1163} abide{G3306} at{G1722} thy{G4675} house{G3588}.
And{G2532} he made haste{G4692}, and came down{G2597}, and{G2532} received{G5264} him{G846} joyfully{G5463}.
And when{G2532} they saw{G1492} it, they all{G537} murmured{G1234}, saying{G3004}, That{G3754} he was gone{G1525} to be guest{G2647} with{G3844} a man{G435} that is a sinner{G268}.

And{G1161} Zacchæus{G2195} stood{G2476}, and said{G2036} unto{G4314} the Lord{G3588}; Behold{G2400}, Lord{G2962}, the half{G2255} of my{G3450} goods{G5224} I give{G1325} to the poor{G4434}; and{G2532} if{G1487} I have taken{G4811} any thing{G5100} from any man{G5100} by false accusation{G4811}, I restore{G591} him fourfold{G5073}.

And{G1161} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto{G4314} him{G846}, This day{G4594} is salvation{G4991} come{G1096} to this{G5129} house{G3588}, forsomuch{G3754}as{G2530} he{G846} also{G2532} is{G2076} a son{G5207} of Abraham{G11}.
For{G1063} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} is come{G2064} to seek{G2212} and{G2532} to save{G4982} that which{G3588} was lost{G622}.

And as{G1161} they{G846} heard{G191} these things{G5023}, he added{G4369} and spake{G2036} a parable{G3850}, because{G1223} he{G846} was{G1511} nigh{G1451} to Jerusalem{G2419}, and because{G2532} they{G846} thought{G1380} that{G3754} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} should{G3195} immediately{G3916} appear{G398}.

He said{G2036} therefore{G3767}, A certain{G5100} nobleman{G2104} went{G4198} into{G1519} a far{G3117} country{G5561} to receive{G2983} for himself{G1438} a kingdom{G932}, and{G2532} to return{G5290}.

And{G1161} he called{G2564} his{G1438} ten{G1176} servants{G1401}, and delivered{G1325} them{G846} ten{G1176} pounds{G3414}, and{G2532} said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846}, Occupy{G4231} till{G2193} I come{G2064}.

But{G1161} his{G846} citizens{G4177} hated{G3404} him{G846}, and{G2532} sent{G649} a message{G4242} after{G3694} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, We will{G2309} not{G3756} have{G2309} this{G5126} man to reign{G936} over{G1909} us{G2248}.

And{G2532} it came to pass{G1096}, that when{G1722} he was{G846} returned{G1880}, having received{G2983} the kingdom{G3588}, then{G2532} he commanded{G2036} these{G5128} servants{G3588} to be called{G5455} unto him{G846}, to whom{G3739} he had given{G1325} the money{G3588}, that{G2443} he might know{G1097} how much{G5101} every man{G5101} had gained by trading{G1281}.
Then{G1161} came{G3854} the first{G4413}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, thy{G4675} pound{G3588} hath gained{G4333} ten{G1176} pounds{G3414}.

And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Well{G2095}, thou good{G18} servant{G1401}: because{G3754} thou hast been{G1096} faithful{G4103} in{G1722} a very little{G1646}, have thou{G2468} authority{G1849} over{G1883} ten{G1176} cities{G4172}.
And{G2532} the second{G1208} came{G2064}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, thy{G4675} pound{G3588} hath gained{G4160} five{G4002} pounds{G3414}.
And{G1161} he said{G2036} likewise{G2532} to him{G5129}, Be{G1096} thou{G4771} also{G2532} over{G1883} five{G4002} cities{G4172}.
And{G2532} another{G2087} came{G2064}, saying{G3004}, Lord{G2962}, behold{G2400}, here is thy{G4675} pound{G3588}, which{G3739} I have{G2192} kept laid up{G606} in{G1722} a napkin{G4676}:

For{G1063} I feared{G5399} thee{G4571}, because{G3754} thou art{G1488} an austere{G840} man{G444}: thou takest up{G142} that{G3739} thou layedst{G5087} not{G3756} down{G5087}, and{G2532} reapest{G2325} that{G3739} thou didst{G4687} not{G3756} sow{G4687}.

And{G1161} he saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Out of{G1537} thine own{G4675} mouth{G3588} will I judge{G2919} thee{G4571}, thou wicked{G4190} servant{G1401}. Thou knewest{G1492} that{G3754} I{G1473} was{G1510} an austere{G840} man{G444}, taking up{G142} that{G3739} I laid{G5087} not{G3756}down{G5087}, and{G2532} reaping{G2325} that{G3739} I did{G4687} not{G3756} sow{G4687}:

Wherefore{G1223} then{G2532} gavest{G1325} not{G3756} thou{G1325} my{G3450} money{G3588} into{G1909} the bank{G3588}, that at{G2532} my{G1473} coming{G2064} I might have required{G4238} mine own{G846} with{G4862} usury{G5110}?
And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto them that{G3588} stood by{G3936}, Take{G142} from{G575} him{G846} the pound{G3414}, and{G2532} give{G1325} it to him that{G3588} hath{G2192} ten{G1176} pounds{G3414}.
(And{G2532} they said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Lord{G2962}, he hath{G2192} ten{G1176} pounds{G3414}.)

For{G1063} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, That{G3754} unto every one{G3956} which{G3588} hath{G2192} shall be given{G1325}; and{G1161} from{G575} him{G3588} that hath{G2192} not{G3361}, even{G2532} that{G3739} he hath{G2192} shall be taken away{G142} from{G575} him{G846}.

But{G4133} those{G1565} mine{G3450} enemies{G2190}, which{G3588} would{G2309} not{G3361} that I{G3165} should reign{G936} over{G1909} them{G846}, bring{G71} hither{G5602}, and{G2532} slay{G2695} them before{G1715} me{G3450}.
And{G2532} when he had{G2036} thus{G5023} spoken{G2036}, he went{G4198} before{G1715}, ascending up{G305} to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2414}.

And{G2532} it came to pass{G1096}, when{G5613} he was come nigh{G1448} to{G1519} Bethphage{G967} and{G2532} Bethany{G963}, at{G4314} the mount{G3588} called{G2564} the mount of Olives{G1636}, he sent{G649} two{G1417} of his{G846} disciples{G3588},

Saying{G2036}, Go ye{G5217} into{G1519} the village{G2968} over against{G2713} you; in{G1722} the which{G3739} at your entering{G1531} ye shall find{G2147} a colt{G4454} tied{G1210}, whereon{G1909} yet{G3739} never{G3762} man{G444} sat{G2523}: loose{G3089} him{G846}, and bring{G71} him hither.

And{G2532} if{G1437} any man{G5100} ask{G2065} you{G5209}, Why{G5101} do ye loose{G3089} him? thus{G3779} shall ye say{G2046} unto him{G846}, Because{G3754} the Lord{G3588} hath{G2192} need{G5532} of him{G846}.
And{G1161} they that{G3588} were sent went{G649} their way{G565}, and found{G2147} even as{G2531} he had said{G2036} unto them{G846}.
And{G1161} as they{G846} were loosing{G3089} the colt{G3588}, the owners{G3588} thereof{G846} said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846}, Why{G5101} loose ye{G3089} the colt{G3588}?
And{G1161} they said{G2036}, The Lord{G3588} hath{G2192} need{G5532} of him{G846}.
And{G2532} they brought{G71} him{G846} to{G4314} Jesus{G3588}: and{G2532} they cast{G1977} their{G1438} garments{G3588} upon{G1909} the colt{G3588}, and they set{G1913} Jesus{G3588} thereon{G1913}.
And{G1161} as he{G846} went{G4198}, they spread{G5291} their{G846} clothes{G3588} in{G1722} the way{G3588}.

And{G1161} when he{G846} was come nigh{G1448}, even now{G2235} at{G4314}the descent{G3588} of the mount{G3588} of Olives{G3588}, the whole{G537} multitude{G3588} of the disciples{G3588} began{G756} to rejoice{G5463} and praise{G134} God{G3588} with a loud{G3173} voice{G5456} for{G4012} all{G3956} the mighty works{G1411} that{G3739} they had seen{G1492};

Saying{G3004}, Blessed{G2127} be the King{G935} that{G3588} cometh{G2064} in{G1722} the name{G3686} of the Lord{G2962}: peace{G1515} in{G1722} heaven{G3772}, and{G2532} glory{G1391} in{G1722} the highest{G5310}.
And{G2532} some{G5100} of the Pharisees{G3588} from{G575} among the multitude{G3588} said{G2036} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Master{G1320}, rebuke{G2008} thy{G4675} disciples{G3588}.

And{G2532} he answered{G611} and said{G2036} unto them{G846}, I tell{G3004} you{G5213} that{G3754}, if{G1437} these{G3778} should hold their peace{G4623}, the stones{G3588} would immediately cry out{G2896}.
And{G2532} when{G5613} he was come near{G1448}, he beheld{G1492} the city{G3588}, and wept{G2799} over{G1909} it{G846},

Saying{G3004}, If{G1487} thou hadst known{G1097}, even{G2532} thou{G4771}, at least{G1065} in{G1722} this{G3778} thy{G4675} day{G3588}, the things{G3588} which belong unto{G4314} thy{G4675} peace{G1515}! but{G1161} now{G3568} they are hid{G2928} from{G575} thine{G4675} eyes{G3788}.

For{G3754} the days{G2250} shall come{G2240} upon{G1909} thee{G4571}, that{G2532} thine{G4675} enemies{G2190} shall cast{G4016} a trench{G5482} about thee{G4671}, and{G2532} compass{G4033} thee{G4571} round{G4033}, and{G2532} keep{G4912} thee{G4571} in{G4912} on every side{G3840},

And{G2532} shall lay{G1474} thee{G4571} even with the ground{G1474}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} children{G3588} within{G1722} thee{G4671}; and{G2532} they shall{G863} not{G3756} leave{G863} in{G1722} thee{G4671} one stone{G3037} upon{G1909} another{G3037}; because{G473} thou knewest{G1097} not{G3756} the time{G3588} of thy{G4675} visitation{G3588}.
And{G2532} he went{G1525} into{G1519} the temple{G3588}, and began{G756} to cast out{G1544} them that{G3588} sold{G4453} therein{G846}, and{G2532} them that bought{G59};
Saying{G3004} unto them{G846}, It is written{G1125}, My{G3450} house{G3588} is{G2076} the house{G3624} of prayer{G4335}: but{G1161} ye{G5210} have made{G4160} it{G846} a den{G4693} of thieves{G3027}.

And{G2532} he taught{G1321} daily{G2250} in{G1722} the temple{G3588}. But{G1161} the chief priests{G749} and{G2532} the scribes{G3588} and{G2532} the chief{G4413} of the people{G3588} sought{G2212} to destroy{G622} him{G846},
And{G2532} could{G2147} not{G3756} find{G2147} what{G5101} they might do{G4160}: for{G1063} all{G537} the people{G3588} were very attentive{G1582} to hear{G191} him{G846}.
